content: विक्रुश् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To call aloud, cry out loudly; आक्रोश विक्रोश लपाधिचंडं <ls>Mk. 1. 41</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 42</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">16. 32.</ls> {@--2@} To utter (with <ab>acc.</ab>). {@--3@} To call out to (with <ab>acc.</ab>). {@--4@} To resound. {@--5@} To abuse, revile, censure.
